      • ValidateUser

        public ValidateUser_Result ValidateUser(ValidateUser_Params params)
        Validates user credentials
        Parameters:
        params - ValidateUser_Params object that contains the user's name and password
        Returns:
        A ValidateUser_Result object containing the user's full name and number of records indexed if TRUE, false if FALSE, failed if FAILED

      • getProjects

        public GetProjects_Result getProjects(GetProjects_Params params)
        Gives information about all of a specific user's current projects
        Parameters:
        params - GetProjects_Params object containing the user's name and password
        Returns:
        A GetProjects_Result object containing names of batches within each given project

      • getSampleImage

        public GetSampleImage_Result getSampleImage(GetSampleImage_Params params)
        Returns a sample image for the specified project
        Parameters:
        params - GetSampleImage_Params object containing the user's name, password, and a project ID corresponding to the current project
        Returns:
        Returns a GetSampleImage_Result object containing a sample image for the specified project

      • downloadBatch

        public DownloadBatch_Result downloadBatch(DownloadBatch_Params params)
        Downloads a batch for the user to index
        Parameters:
        params - DownloadBatch_Params object containing the user's name, password, and a project ID corresponding to the current project
        Returns:
        DownloadBatch_Result object containing the newly assigned batch

      • submitBatch

        public SubmitBatch_Result submitBatch(SubmitBatch_Params params)
        Submits a batch from the user to the server
        Parameters:
        params - SubmitBatch_Params object containing the user's name, password, and a batch ID corresponding to the batch to be submitted
        Returns:
        SubmitBatch_Result object indicating true if the batch was submitted successfully or false otherwise

      • getFields

        public GetFields_Result getFields(GetFields_Params params)
        retrieves information about the fields in a specific project
        Parameters:
        params - GetFields_Params object containing the user's name, password, and a project ID corresponding to the current project
        Returns:
        GetFields_Result object containing information about each of the fields for the specified project

      • search

        public GetFields_Result search(GetFields_Params params)
        Searches the indexed records for the specified strings
        Parameters:
        params - GetFields_Params object containing the user's name, password, a comma-seperated list of fields to be searched, and a comma-seperated list of strings to search for
        Returns:
        GetFields_Result object
